nodes.text: Supervisor droids, also known as coordinating droids or overseer droids, were third-degree droids designed to oversee other droids, but were also used as quartermasters, and as technicians to maintain other droids. Some EV-series supervisor droids manufactured by MerenData had motivators that were actually intended for torture droids, which made them sadistic towards their droid underlings. On the droid moon Uffel, supervisor droids were labeled as "lazy droids".
